TypeSignature.Value: public class DataInputStream : Java.IO.FilterInputStream, IDisposable, Java.Interop.IJavaPeerable, Java.IO.IDataInput

.class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DataInputStream extends Java.IO.FilterInputStream implements class Android.Runtime.IJavaObject, class Java.Interop.IJavaPeerable, class Java.IO.IDataInput, class System.IDisposable
type DataInputStream = class inherit FilterInputStream interface IDataInput interface IJavaObject interface IDisposable

Docs.summary: A data input stream lets an application read primitive Java data types from an underlying input stream in a machine-independent way.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: public override sealed int Read (byte[] b);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance int32 Read(unsigned int8[] b) cil managed
override this.Read : byte[] -> int

Docs.param: the buffer into which the data is read.
Docs.summary: Reads some number of bytes from the contained input stream and stores them into the buffer array b.
Docs.returns: the total number of bytes read into the buffer, or -1 if there is no more data because the end of the stream has been reached.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.exception: if the first byte cannot be read for any reason other than end of file, the stream has been closed and the underlying input stream does not support reading after close, or another I/O error occurs.
